an1.309:1: "Bhikkhus, I do not see even a single thing on account of which unarisen unwholesome qualities do not arise and arisen unwholesome qualities decline so much as right view.[n.66]Mp:"This is a designation for the five kinds of right view." Mp-ṭ: "(The views of) ownership of kamma, jhāna, insight, the path, and the fruit. The knowledge included in the jhāna consciousness is the right view of jhāna, while insight knowledge is the right view of insight."For one of right view, unarisen unwholesome qualities do not arise and arisen unwholesome qualities decline."
